synopsis.text: Joker, a product of genetic engineering, is a versatile shape and gender-shifting entity, crafted as a key member of an elite police task force. With the ability to absorb DNA through touch, Joker can effortlessly transform and regenerate, making them a formidable force against crime. As they navigate the dark underworld, Joker encounters Saki, a discarded synthetic human on a twisted quest for a heart to earn his creator's approval. Can Joker put an end to Saki's murderous rampage? Amidst the chaos, Joker still finds time for a touch of romance with a fellow police officer, proving that love can bloom even in the most unlikely circumstances. Prepare for a thrilling ride as Joker takes on criminals of every stripe, serving as cop, judge, and executioner in this captivating anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
